title: SOLD: "T206 The Monster" Booklet by Bill Heitman
author: Baseball Rarities

posts.post_title: SOLD: "T206 The Monster" Booklet by Bill Heitman
posts.post_content:
32 page booklet from 1980 by Bill Heitman. There is a scuff on the front cover and a few small edge chips, but it is in otherwise excellent condition for a 44 year-old publication.

$SOLD delivered in the US via the USPS.

PayPal FF, Venmo FF or a check is fine.

Nearly all of its information and checklists can be found online today, but in 1980 it was very comprehensive. 

It is more of a collectible in itself.

I'll take it!  nice to display in the 'ol office

Let me know where to paypal the funds via PM and will send!
This book is a must have for anyone serious about collecting T206.
